thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tableau Software Q4 Revenue Fell 1 Percent To $249.4 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tableau Software Q4 Revenue Fell 1 Percent To $249.4 Million
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Tableau Software Inc:
* TABLEAU REPORTS Q4 AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.52 * Q4 REVENUE FELL 1 PERCENT TO $249.4 MILLION * QTRLY ‍RATABLE LICENSE BOOKINGS WERE 51% OF TOTAL LICENSE BOOKINGS, COMPARED TO 20% IN Q4 OF 2016​
* ‍TOM WALKER, CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, HAS DECIDED TO STEP DOWN PERMANENTLY FROM CFO POSITION​
* ‍BOARD HAS APPOINTED DAMON FLETCHER, SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE, AS INTERIM CFO​
* ‍BOARD ALSO APPOINTED GERRI MARTIN-FLICKINGER AS A NEW DIRECTOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
